mapper.select: SELECT A.PSA_EMP_NO , B.EMP_NAME, C.JOB_NAME, SUM(A.PSA_WORKINGTIME) WORKINGT, SUM(A.PSA_OVERTIME) OVERT, SUM(A.PSA_TOTAL) TOTALT, DECODE(144000-SUM(A.PSA_WORKINGTIME),144000,0,144000-SUM(A.PSA_WORKINGTIME) ) LEAVEWT, DECODE(43200-SUM(A.PSA_OVERTIME),43200,0,43200-SUM(A.PSA_OVERTIME) ) LEAVEOT FROM PS_ATTENDANCE A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.PSA_EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO JOIN JOB_LEVEL C ON B.JOB_CODE = C.JOB_CODE WHERE A.PSA_CREATEDATE BETWEEN #{start_date} AND #{end_date} AND B.DEPT_CODE = #{dept} GROUP BY A.PSA_EMP_NO, B.EMP_NAME, C.JOB_NAME ORDER BY A.PSA_EMP_NO ASC
